properties.description: Do not duplicate files in a location by copying them
2nd dynamic file for parameterization of Products.csv

sqlReaderQuery.value: select Tablename, Watermarkvalue AS OldWaterMarkValue FROM WatermarkTable WHERE Tablename = '@{pipeline().parameters.TableName}'
select Tablename, Watermarkvalue AS OldWaterMarkValue FROM WatermarkTable WHERE Tablename = 'Orders'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(InsertDateTime) AS NewWaterMarkValue FROM Orders

properties.description: This pipeline will incrementally load data from source tables to target
